Ability.Name: Crusader Strike
Ability.Lua:
local HA = UnitBuffID("player", 105809) local HP = UnitPower("player", 9)
if PQR_SpellAvailable(35395) and inMelee() then --If Holy Avenger is up if HA ~= nil and HP <= 2 then _castSpell(35395, "target")
end
--if its not up. if HA == nil and HP < 5 then _castSpell(35395, "target") end end

Ability.Name: Judgment
Ability.Lua:
local HA = PQR_UnitBuffID("player", 105809) local jdg = PQR_SpellAvailable(20271) local HP = UnitPower("player", 9)
--if Holy Avenger is up if HA ~= nil and HP <= 2 and jdg == true then return true end
-- If its not up if HA == nil and HP < 5 and jdg == true then return true end

Ability.Name: Inquisition
Ability.Lua:
local holyPower = UnitPower("player", 9) local divinePurpose = UnitBuffID("player", 86172) local inquisition, _, _, _, _, _, inquisitionEndTime = UnitBuffID("player", 84963)
if inquisition ~= nil then inquisitionEndTime = inquisitionEndTime - GetTime() end
if inquisition == nil or inquisitionEndTime <= 5 then if holyPower >= 3 or divinePurpose ~= nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(84963), "player") end end

Ability.Name: Exorcism
Ability.Lua:
MassExoGlyph = false
for i = 1, 6 do _, _, _, glyphSpell, _ = GetGlyphSocketInfo(i, nil) if glyphSpell == 83107 then MassExoGlyph = true end end
if MassExoGlyph and PQR_SpellAvailable(122032) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(122032), "target") end
if not MassExoGlyph and PQR_SpellAvailable(879) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(879), "target") end

Ability.Name: Freedom
Ability.Lua: if AutoFreedom then if PQR_SpellAvailable(1044) then for i=1, #members do if hasRoot(members[i].Unit) ~= nil then _castSpell(1044, members[i].Unit) end end end end

Ability.Name: Templars Verdict
Ability.Lua:
if UnitPower("player", 9) >= 3 then if PQR_SpellAvailable(20271) == false and PQR_SpellAvailable(35395) == false and ( PQR_SpellAvailable(879) == false or PQR_SpellAvailable(122032) == false ) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(85256), "target") end end
if UnitPower("player", 9) == 5 or UnitBuffID("player", 86172) or ( UnitBuffID("player", 105809) and UnitPower("player", 9) == 3 ) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(85256), "target") end

Ability.Name: Flash of Light
Ability.Lua: if folKey and UnitExists("target") then return true elseif folKey and not UnitExists("target") then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(19750), "player") return false end

Ability.Name: Hammer of Wrath
Ability.Lua:
local EnemyHP = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target")
if PQR_SpellAvailable(121783) then if UnitBuffID("player", 31884) or EnemyHP <= 20 then if UnitPower("player", 9) < 5 then _castSpell(24275, "target") end end end

Ability.Name: Word of Glory
Ability.Lua:
local hp = UnitPower("player", 9) local myHp = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player")
if myHp < wogHP and hp == 3 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(85673), "player") end
if PQR_SpellAvailable(85673) then for i=1, #members do if UnitDebuffID(members[i].Unit, 33786) then return false end
if members[i].HP < wogHP and PQR_IsOutOfSight(members[i].Unit) == false and IsSpellInRange("Flash of Light", members[i].Unit) == 1 and not UnitIsEnemy(members[i].Unit, "player") and hp == 3 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(85673), members[i].Unit) end end end

Ability.Name: Flag Return (PvP)
Ability.Lua: if GetBattlefieldStatus(1)=='active' or GetBattlefieldStatus(2)=='active' then InteractUnit('Horde flag') InteractUnit('Alliance flag') end

Ability.Name: Cleanse
Ability.Lua: if PQR_SpellAvailable(4987) then for i=1, #members do if ValidDispel(members[i].Unit) then _castSpell(4987, members[i].Unit) end end end

Ability.Name: Hammer of Justice
Ability.Lua:
local _, talent = GetTalentRowSelectionInfo(2) local hojid = 853
if talent == 4 then hojid = 105593
end
if hojKey then if UnitExists("focus") and UnitCanAttack("player","focus") ~= nil then _castSpell(hojid, "focus") end
if UnitExists("target") and not UnitExists("focus") and UnitCanAttack("player","target") ~= nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(hojid), "target") end end

Ability.Name: Divine Shield
Ability.Lua:
local myHealth = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player")
if AutoBubble and PQR_SpellAvailable(642) and myHealth < BubbleHP then _castSpell(642) end

Ability.Name: Turn Undead
Ability.Lua:
local TU = UnitDebuffID("mouseover", 10326) local HW = UnitDebuffID("mouseover", 2812) local hasFocus = UnitExists("mouseover") local type= UnitCreatureType("mouseover")
if UnitIsEnemy("mouseover","player") == nil then return false end
if hasFocus ~= nil then if type == "Undead" or type == "Demon" then if TU == nil and HW == nil then return true end end end

Ability.Name: Hand of Protection
Ability.Lua:
if bopKey then if UnitExists("mouseover") then _castSpell(1022, "mouseover") end end
if AutoBoP then for i = 1, #members do if BopBlind and UnitDebuffID(members[i].Unit, 2094) then _castSpell(1022, members[i].Unit) end
if BoplowHP and members[i].HP < BopHP then _castSpell(1022, members[i].Unit) end end end

Ability.Name: Holy Prism
Ability.Lua:
if PQR_SpellAvailable(114165) and UnitBuffID("player", 84963) ~= nil then _castSpell(114165, "target") end
if PQR_SpellAvailable(114157) and UnitBuffID("player", 84963) ~= nil then _castSpell(114157, "target") end

Ability.Name: Buffs
Ability.Lua:
if GetShapeshiftForm("player") == 0 then CastShapeshiftForm(1) end
-- buff if not UnitAffectingCombat("player") then if UnitBuffID("player", 19740) == nil and UnitBuffID("player", 116956) == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(19740), "player") elseif UnitBuffID("player", 116956) then if UnitBuffID("player", 20217) == nil and UnitBuffID("player", 1126) == nil and UnitBuffID("player", 90363) == nil and UnitBuffID("player", 115921) == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(20217), "player") end end end

Ability.Name: -- Init--
Ability.Lua:
-- PQInterface is an absolute requirement from now on. if not IsAddOnLoaded("PQInterface") then PQR_WriteToChat("|cffDC143CPQInterface is required to run this profile!|cffffffff", "Warning") PQR_WriteToChat("|cffDC143CThe profile has been stopped.|cffffffff", "Warning") PQR_StopRotation() end
-- Load LUA data files. if PQR_RotationStarted then PQR_RotationStarted = false StatusReport = true
-- Load required data files if PQR_LoadLua ~= nil then if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_PaladinPvP_Data.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("|cffb73737You're missing PQR_PaladinPvP_Data.lua - Make sure it's in your Data folder! The Rotation has been halted.|cffffffff", "Error") PQR_StopRotation() return true end if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_PQI.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("|cffb73737You're missing PQR_PQI.lua - It's required to run the profile! The Rotation has been halted.|cffffffff", "Error") PQR_StopRotation() return true end end end
shHP = PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_FolSelflessHealerHP_value wogHP = PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_WordofGloryHP_value DivineProtHP = PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_DivineProtection_value BubbleHP = PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_Bubble_value HealthstoneHP = PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_Healthstone_value BopHP = PQI_CpoworksSacandBopSettings_LowHPBoP_value
AutoFreedom = PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_AutoFreedom_enable AutoEmancipate = PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_AutoEmancipate_enable AutoInterupt = PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_AutoInterupt_enable AutoDivineProt = PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_DivineProtection_enable AutoBubble = PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_Bubble_enable AutoHealthstone = PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_Healthstone_enable AutoSac = PQI_CpoworksSacandBopSettings_AutoSac_enable AutoBoP = PQI_CpoworksSacandBopSettings_AutoBoP_enable AutoSacName = PQI_CpoworksSacandBopSettings_SacTarget_enable
SacName = PQI_CpoworksSacandBopSettings_SacTarget_value SacTrap = PQI_CpoworksSacandBopSettings_Trap_enable SacSheep = PQI_CpoworksSacandBopSettings_Sheep_enable SacFear = PQI_CpoworksSacandBopSettings_Fear_enable SacHoJ = PQI_CpoworksSacandBopSettings_HoJ_enable BopBlind = PQI_CpoworksSacandBopSettings_Blind_enable BoplowHP = PQI_CpoworksSacandBopSettings_LowHPBoP_enable
GroupInfo()
--Keybinds folKey = PQI:IsHotkeys(PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_FlashofLight_key) pauseKey = PQI:IsHotkeys(PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_PauseRotation_key) bopKey = PQI:IsHotkeys(PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_BopKey_key)
if not PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_BurstKey_enable then burstKey = IsMouseButtonDown(3) else burstKey = PQI:IsHotkeys(PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_BurstKey_key) end if not PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_HoJKey_enable then hojKey = IsMouseButtonDown(4) else hojKey = PQI:IsHotkeys(PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_HoJKey_key) end if not PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_BlindKey_enable then blindKey = IsMouseButtonDown(5) else blindKey = PQI:IsHotkeys(PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_BlindKey_key) end
if not PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_FlashofLight_enable then folKey = false end if not PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_PauseRotation_enable then pauseKey = false end if not PQI_CpoworksRetPvPConfigSettings_BopKey_enable then bopKey = false end
exoID = 879 if GlyphCheck(122028) then exoID = 122032 end
--HOTKEYS -- if pauseKey or IsMounted() then return true end

Ability.Name: -- Start Fight --
Ability.Lua: if UnitInVehicle("player") or UnitIsDead("target") or not UnitAffectingCombat("player") or not UnitExists("target") then return true end

Ability.Name: Cooldowns
Ability.Lua:
if burstKey then
-- Gloves if GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",10) == 0 then UseInventoryItem(10) end
--Trinkets if GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",13) == 0 then UseInventoryItem(13) end
--Holy Avenger CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(105809)))
--Wings CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(31884)))
--goak CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(86698)))
end

Ability.Name: Hand of Sac
Ability.Lua:
if AutoSac then if PQR_SpellAvailable(6940) and not AutoSacName then for i=1, #members do if SacTrap then if SacTraps(members[i].Unit) then _castSpell(6940, members[i].Unit) end end if SacSheep then if SacSheeps(members[i].Unit) then _castSpell(6940, members[i].Unit) end end if SacFear then if SacFears(members[i].Unit) then _castSpell(6940, members[i].Unit) end end if SacHoj then if SacHojs(members[i].Unit) then _castSpell(6940, members[i].Unit) end end end end
if PQR_SpellAvailable(6940) and AutoSacName and UnitExists(SacName) then if SacTrap then if SacTraps(SacName) then _castSpell(6940, SacName) end end if SacSheep then if SacSheeps(SacName) then _castSpell(6940, SacName) end end if SacFear then if SacFears(SacName) then _castSpell(6940, SacName) end end if SacHoj then if SacHojs(SacName) then _castSpell(6940, SacName) end end end end

Ability.Name: Emancipate
Ability.Lua:
local myMana = 100 * UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player")
if PQR_SpellAvailable(121783) and AutoEmancipate then if hasRoot("player") ~= nil and myMana > 20 then _castSpell(121783) end end

Ability.Name: Flash of Light Selfless Healer
Ability.Lua:
local myHp = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") local SH, _, _, Stack = UnitBuffID( "player", 114250 )
if PQR_SpellAvailable(19750) then if members[1].HP < shHP and SH and Stack == 3 then _castSpell(19750, members[1].Unit) end end

Ability.Name: Blinding Light
Ability.Lua: if blindKey then if PQR_SpellAvailable(115750) then _castSpell(115750) end end

Ability.Name: Interupts
Ability.Lua:
local InterruptSpells = { 331, 77472, 73920, 8004, 8936, 50464, 5185, 740, 2061, 2060, 32546, 64843, 47540, 19750, 82326, 7328, 54428, 82327, 115175, 124682, 116694, 116694, 51514, 33786, 2637, 5782, 111771, 5232, 710, 605, 9484, 32375, 20066, 118, 61305, 28272, 61721, 61780, 28271, 2641, 1513, 982 }
if PQR_SpellAvailable(96231) then for y=1, #cTar do if UnitExists(cTar[y]) and UnitIsEnemy(cTar[y], "player") and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(57994), cTar[y]) == 1 and PQR_UnitFacing("player", cTar[y]) then local spellName, _, _, _, startCast, endCast, _, _, canInterrupt = UnitCastingInfo(cTar[y]) for i=1, #InterruptSpells do if GetSpellInfo(InterruptSpells[i]) == spellName and canInterrupt == false then if ((endCast/1000) - GetTime()) < 0.3 then _castSpell(96231, cTar[y]) end end end end end end
